sentence: “Yet because of the way the federal criminal laws are written in the way that cannabis is placed in schedule one, it is very easy for a marijuana offense to actually get someone a worse sentence than an opioid offense like overprescribing OxyContin or selling fentanyl or a firearms.” Rep. Jim Jordan voiced outrage at the marijuana bill’s timing, saying that issues such as crime, inflation, and illegal immigration should be taking precedence.
title: Inflation, Immigration, Mass Destruction: DEMS FINALLY HAVE A PLAN!

sentence: “Every major urban area has increased crime and Democrats are legalizing drugs and propping up the marijuana industry,” Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) said on the House floor.
author: Arthur Delaney
title: House Passes Marijuana Decriminalization Bill

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan voiced outrage at the marijuana bill's timing, saying that issues such as crime, inflation, and illegal immigration should be taking precedence.
title: House votes to decriminalize marijuana at federal level

sentence: The bill was vigorously opposed by some Republicans such as Representative Jim Jordan (R-OH), who took to the podium to rail against what he argued is a seriously skewed sense of priorities.
author: Joshua Nybo
title: ‘Wow. Wow!’ Jim Jordan goes OFF on cowardly Dem priorities as House votes to decriminalize marijuana

author: Fix This Nation Staff
title: Pelosi Leads Charge To Decriminalize Marijuana Possession
